messages.message:
@Aaron Tami @Ashish @shaunak @Matt This is the error which RBS got

 “Ari Exception: The operation cannot be performed because no pages are specified.. File: MeenaGanesaperumal/OCRTest/fs/Instabase Drive/samples/ExtractData/out/s1_process_files/images/20.pdf_p0.jpg”,

Saw similar issue with BAML too

Whether restarting OCR-Ari service helps here?
yes restarting ocr-ari service should fix it
Do we know the root cause for this issue? Whether this issue will occur again if we push the latest build?
